parameters: \n<Yurasa>Looks like some kind of control room.
\n<Yurasa>Something's trying to break through the gate!
\n<Yurasa>It looks like more are coming, too.
\n<Elovia>Let 'em in.\.\. If we keep the door closed, they'll just build up and we'll end up having to fight all of them at once.
\n<Yurasa>We've got four Walkers and a Sentinel outside right now.
Use the time between waves to prepare for the next group of enemies as you see fit. Activate the lever to then start the next wave.
Let the next wave in? (4 X Walker, 1 X Sentinel)
\n<Yurasa>Okay, looks like we've got four Drones and two Wasps approaching now. Coming in hot.
Let the next wave in? (4 X Drone, 2 X Wasp)
\n<Yurasa>We've got two Wasps, a Drone and one of those Mimic things.
\n<Yurasa>We've got two Wasps, a Drone and...
\n<Yurasa>I'm not sure what that is, it looks like one of those chests we've seen around the facility...
Let the next wave in? (2 X Wasp, 1 X Walker, 1 X Mimic)
\n<Yurasa>Alright, looks like that's the last of 'em.
\n<Yurasa>Y-you mean it? I thought I was just-\.\.\^
\n<Elovia>That's not a good thing, is it?
You have received your first Perks, \ia[160] and \ia[200]. Equip them the same way you would your other equipment.
\n<Elovia>I think we're safe to keep moving.
